text: Pas, ʙa roh aftodand, to ʙa ahli şahre rasidand [va] az onon ƣizo xostand; [ammo onon] az mehmon kardani eşon xuddorī kardand. Sipas dar on ço devore joftand, ki mexost furū ʙirezad va [Xizr] onro rostu ustuvor kard. [Mūso] Guft: «Agar mexostī, [metavonistī] ʙaroi on [kor az onon] muzde ʙigirī»
